title: New MPfree: Taphi – I’m Losing Sleep
content: California’s music scene receives it’s fair share of praise, albeit at times undeservingly so, yet with this new track from Costa Mesa songstress Taphi, there’s plenty of reason to celebrate her work. There’s hints of Laura Marling and Sarah Jaffe in the delicately delivered vocals; two artists whom have numerous imitators but few who have perfected the art of sensual songwriting that originally made their inspirations so successful. I’m Losing Sleep finds Taphi weeping ‘I don’t know why you left my lips dry’ in a manner so graceful that it’s impossible to feel nothing for her plight and her tender words. Stream and download I’m Losing Sleep below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
